answers.answer: Water doesnt effect it.. I had to do the 2 hr glucose test but after midnight I was eating soft ice... I ended up passing my fasting and my one hour but my 2nd hour I failed :( by a couple of points
On Thursday I took my 2nd glucose test but I ate some grapes before I went in and I forgot I wasn't supposed too. So water will be my bestfriend
What did they end up having you doing?
Being pregnant is soo hard NOT to eat!! So they diagnosed me with gestational diabetes.. im not on any medicine for it i just have to check my sugar levels from now on..

I failed my glucose test & the 3hr! My OB sent me to a dietician and ordered me a blood sugar monitor to check my blood sugar 4 times a day and it's been fine. If you are diagnosed with GD you will probably have to see a dietician and she will discuss a diet with you, which isn't bad! Important thing is keeping blood sugar under control so your baby doesn't grow larger than normal. Good luck!

Ur right pregnancy is tuff. Im dealing with my bp being high and to add that will be stressful. I see many family members including my mom whole deal with diabetes everyday and I help her out a lot to make sure she is ok and if her sugar is under control. Im due in two weeks and if I have to that to make sure my baby is fine then I will but im just worried about have both these issues at the same time

I have a high risk pregnancy.. Ive been diagnosed with GD And Preeclampsia (high bp) and on top of all that I still feel nauseous.. it is really stressful im a ftm and im 32 weeks.. idk how im doing it..
Im like on the line to having preaclampsia. I had it with my son which makes me at a higher risk of getting it. But how do you deal with it all. Thats a lot on your plate

To be honest... I dont know how im doing it.. im really taking it day by day. And just monitoring my sugars and blood pressure. But if both of them are fine I still eat what I want something I know thats not gunna get me sick..

question: So my 2nd glucose test came back with high sugar levels and they want me to take another one tomorrow except for this time its for 2hours. They said not to wat past midnight but I just want to know does drinking water effect anything? If anyone been through this do better results come from the longer test? Plz help
title: 2hour glucose test question
